reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Administrative Costs of ODA Projects in the Americas

description.narrative: Project facilitation costs covering planning, implementation and resources as part of ODA projects in the Americas. [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
